pages.text: By applying a simple hexing $(l:bewitchment:rituals/rituals)Ritual$(), magical energy can be compensated. This will remove any enchantments from an item, also repairing it in the process.$(br2)Items affected by this $(l:bewitchment:rituals/rituals)Ritual$() need to be thrown into the circle $(o)after$() it has been started. It will additionally reset the anvil cost of the items.
